ygData.subject: Re: Freeport Bard Quests?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There are no bard-related quests in Freeport.  We re lucky to have more quests (that I have found) for our class than any other class, as far as I know. (1
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:15 PM 5/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
> I have not been able to get any of the Bard Vendors or GM's to respond to my
> 'hails'. Are there any Freeport Bard quests that are working on other
> servers?


There are no bard-related quests in Freeport. We're lucky to have more quests
(that I have found) for our class than any other class, as far as I know.
(1 in Kelethin, 2 in Qeynos, and 1 in Karanas)
That's Bard-specific quests, mind you.

I've also managed to complete several non-specific quests, and am currently
investigating others...
(mutters about bug bits in Rivervale)


Talies on Bristlebane
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
